Package organism

Class Organism

java.lang.Object
java.util.BitSet
organism.Organism
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Comparable<Organism>
public class Organism extends BitSet implements Comparable<Organism>
The Class Organism. Extends BitSet since that is well adapted to binary knapsack problems. If this were more general purpose, I'd make Organism an interface, then an OrgBitSet or similar so in the future we could extend Organism to use strings/characters as the DNA representation. E.g. currently [0,1,0,0] Some problems more naturally resolve to [A,G,T,C] etc.
